accept

public final boolean accept(java.lang.String word,
                            boolean isSplit,
                            boolean isNormalized)
Test whether the word is acceptable.

Specified by:
accept in interface WordAcceptor
Parameters:
word - the word to test.
isNormalized - true if the word is already normalized.
Returns:
true to accept the word; otherwise, false.

Split the text into normalized words.

Default splitting uses the normalized string split method.
